name: Caves of the Forgotten
description:
Description

A short game about exploring the depths of the caves of the forgotten. 

Put your spelunking skills to work and discover the characters lost to the depths...

Controls

Move: WASD

Use: E

Details

All assets and code made by me in 48 hours.

My first game jam!

Made for Ludem Dare 48 - Theme: Deeper and Deeper
